meanings.definition: A feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit.
meanings.sent1: The roller coaster ride left me with a sense of nausea.
meanings.sent2: The smell of rotten eggs filled me with nausea.
meanings.sent3: The idea of eating a peanut butter and onion sandwich filled me with nausea.
meanings.sent4: The sight of the overflowing garbage can was a wave of nausea.
meanings.sent5: The taste of spoiled milk in my mouth brought on a wave of nausea.

meanings.sent1: The thought of eating bugs filled me with nausea.
meanings.sent2: The sight of the slimy creature caused nausea to rise in me.
meanings.sent3: The idea of wearing socks with sandals gave me a feeling of nausea.
meanings.sent4: The politician's lies were a source of nausea for the public.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the expired yogurt left a lingering feeling of nausea in my mouth.
